name: The VHS Dungeon
description:
Made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 in one week by a single dev. The theme for this game jam is "Rewind".  I forgot to remove an extra item (a key) that I was using for testing purposes, allowing you to bypass a lot of the game. It's too late to re upload though. If you want to experience correctly, don't use the key that's right by the door it's for. There is another one elsewhere.

You've recently heard about a new technology that will revolutionize the way we consume media. It is referred to as "DVD". This is your tale about a trip to "The DVD Store".

Move with WASD

Pick up items with LMB

Use held items with LMB

Drop items with E

Throw items with R

NOTE: If important items are lost, they should respawn at their original location.
